blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

body:
I’ve been thinking.

Dan’s probably gonna post a video fairly soon. Within the next few weeks. And after the absolute god awful aftermath of ttlmt, a shitstorm that no doubt contributed to a year-long hiatus, y’all better be angels.


If Dan posts again, and y’all act snotty about whatever he puts up, I’m going to lose my shit.

reblog.comment:

blog.description: I love drawing Dan and Phil I'm totally not addicted

body:
@amazingphil 🌹✨

wanted to draw a kinda complicated background to get my mind off school as I’m getting v stressed 🖤

Likes and reblogs make my day 🤠👊🏻
